DTMod:DisturbingTactics.NAME: Disturbing Tactics
DTMod:DisturbingTactics.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose Strength equal to <TBA>
DTMod:DisturbingTactics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL All enemies lose Strength equal to <TBA>

DTMod:BadJoker.NAME: Bad Joker
DTMod:BadJoker.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random Attacks to add to your hand.

DTMod:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
DTMod:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Draw cards until you have 5 cards in hand.

DTMod:FlyingCard.NAME: Flying Card
DTMod:FlyingCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage for each card generated in this combat.

DTMod:Configure.NAME: Configure
DTMod:Configure.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

DTMod:MagicTrick.NAME: Magic Trick
DTMod:MagicTrick.DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. NL Discard !M! card.
DTMod:MagicTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. NL Discard !M! cards.

DTMod:SecondChance.NAME: Second Chance
DTMod:SecondChance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Repeat until you have 5 cards in hand.

DTMod:HiddenCard.NAME: Hidden Card
DTMod:HiddenCard.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Card from your discard pile.
DTMod:HiddenCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Card from your discard pile. Gain Block equal to twice the cost of it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Cards in my discard pile.

DTMod:JackOfSpades.NAME: Jack of Spades
DTMod:JackOfSpades.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:StackedDeck.NAME: Stacked Deck
DTMod:StackedDeck.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.
DTMod:StackedDeck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL At the start of your turn, Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.

DTMod:ForbiddenStrike.NAME: Forbidden Strike
DTMod:ForbiddenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL You cannot Upgrade any other cards at rest sites.

DTMod:OpeningTactics.NAME: Opening Tactics
DTMod:OpeningTactics.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has full HP, Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Deal !D! damage.

DTMod:RefreshTactics.NAME: Refresh Tactics
DTMod:RefreshTactics.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.
